channel.title: The Veil: Tessitura
channel.description:
![070425bc96953b0059f058eb36878f1e|564x317](upload://3fCi7D11T8YQuDhGV75OSrolbXT.jpeg) # The room flickers in front of you for an instant like a PMP losing reception. You hear the hammer snap back on a cheap poly and you can almost smell the ozone as the bullet glides out of the chamber. The window flies apart in shatterproof shards the size of disembodied limbs. Your neurochip feeds you the trajectory of the unequivocal sentence of death speeding your way as your eyes swivel in their machined sockets. Juice crashes through your veins. You've only got a split second to make a move. What do you do? A seat is being held for Fraser Simons. >**Content warnings:** Capitalism & potential for: violence, trans-humanism, mechanical replacing biological, ... **System:** [ *The Veil* ](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/199467/The-Veil-Cyberpunk-Roleplaying-Powered-by-the-Apocalypse&affiliate_id=1113880) **Duration:** Four, three hour sessions **Breaks:** Two hourly breaks per session (~10 minutes each) **Venue:** [Zoom](https://www.zoom.com/) **Recording:** Yes, with the consent of all players each session **Attendance:** Joining all sessions is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. **Safety:** [Lines & Veils](https://rpg.stackexchange.com/questions/30906/what-do-the-terms-lines-and-veils-mean) and [X-card](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SB0jsx34bWHZWbnNIVVuMjhDkrdFGo1_hSC2BWPlI3A/edit#!). This series adheres to the [Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) and has an open door policy.
# Sessions *(Fridays EST)* **all-access date:** [date=2021-03-21 time=16:33:00 timezone="America/New_York"] **[date=2021-04-02 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]:** https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MW666ImmEK4dUXW_TkQ **[date=2021-04-09 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]:** https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MW66CrGJmHlQnWgAOoe **[date=2021-04-16 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]:** https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MW66IDO8cGIfH_Tr_YG **[date=2021-04-23 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]:** https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MW66P33o8tQp3S1y4Ip **[date=2021-04-30 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]:** https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MW66Tj3miGdY7n8i7Bo

item.title: The Veil: Tessitura
item.dc:creator: @jkitz
item.description:
@jkitz wrote:

I’m not sure if this is entirely appropriate as a reply, but I did make a video “unboxing” The Veil a couple weeks ago.
Maybe it will get some folks interested in playing, or picking up the game.

item.title: The Veil: Tessitura
item.dc:creator: @darren
item.description:
@darren wrote:

The room flickers in front of you for an instant like a PMP losing reception. You hear the hammer snap back on a cheap poly and you can almost smell the ozone as the bullet glides out of the chamber. The window flies apart in shatterproof shards the size of disembodied limbs. Your neurochip feeds you the trajectory of the unequivocal sentence of death speeding your way as your eyes swivel in their machined sockets. Juice crashes through your veins. You’ve only got a split second to make a move. What do you do?

A seat is being held for Fraser Simons.

Content warnings: Capitalism & potential for: violence, trans-humanism, mechanical replacing biological, …
System: The Veil
Duration: Four, three hour sessions
Breaks: Two hourly breaks per session (~10 minutes each)
Venue: Zoom
Recording: Yes, with the consent of all players each session
Attendance: Joining all sessions is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
Safety: Lines & Veils and X-card. This series adheres to the Community Code of Conduct and has an open door policy.

Sessions

(Fridays EST) all-access date: 2021-03-21T20:33:00Z
